verses.verse: And Abraham <S%H85><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in age: <S%H3117><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> in all things. <S%H3605><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his eldest <S%H2205><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> that ruled <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had, Put, <S%H7760><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my thigh: <S%H3409><s%>

And I will make thee swear <S%H7650><s%> by the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> unto my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> dwell: <S%H3427><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my country, <S%H776><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> my kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> unto my son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Peradventure <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> must I needs bring <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> again unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from whence <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou camest? <S%H3318><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Beware <S%H8104><s%> thou that <S%H6435><s%> thou bring <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H853><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> again.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> which <S%H834><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> me from my father's house, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1><s%> and from the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of my kindred, <S%H4138><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto me, and that <S%H834><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> unto my son <S%H1121><s%> from thence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> thee, then thou shalt be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7621><s%> <S%H2063><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> bring <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> again.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the thigh <S%H3409><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his master, <S%H113><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> to him concerning <S%H5921><s%> that <S%H2088><s%> matter. <S%H1697><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> of the camels <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1581><s%> of his master, <S%H113><s%> and departed; <S%H1980><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the goods <S%H2898><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> were in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

And he made his camels <S%H1581><s%> to kneel down <S%H1288><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by <S%H413><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening, <S%H6153><s%> even the time <S%H6256><s%> that women go out <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> send me good speed <S%H7136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> stand <S%H5324><s%> here by <S%H5921><s%> the well <S%H5869><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And let it come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> I shall say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> Let down <S%H5186><s%> thy pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> that I may drink; <S%H8354><s%> and she shall say, <S%H559><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will give thy camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> let the same be she that thou hast appointed <S%H3198><s%> for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and thereby shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast showed <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my master. <S%H113><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking, <S%H1696><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> came out, <S%H3318><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham's <S%H85><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> her shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> fair <S%H2896><s%> to look upon, <S%H4758><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> had any man <S%H376><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> her: and she went down <S%H3381><s%> to the well, <S%H5869><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> her pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> and came up. <S%H5927><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> Let me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> drink <S%H1572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of thy pitcher. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3537><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> Drink, <S%H8354><s%> my lord: <S%H113><s%> and she hasted, <S%H4116><s%> and let down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and gave him drink. <S%H8248><s%>

And when she had done <S%H3615><s%> giving him drink, <S%H8248><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> I will draw <S%H7579><s%> water for thy camels <S%H1581><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H518><s%> they have done <S%H3615><s%> drinking. <S%H8354><s%>

And she hasted, <S%H4116><s%> and emptied <S%H6168><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the trough, <S%H8268><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, and drew <S%H7579><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his camels. <S%H1581><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> wondering <S%H7583><s%> at her held his peace, <S%H2790><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> whether the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had made his journey <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> had done <S%H3615><s%> drinking, <S%H8354><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> earring <S%H5141><s%> of half a shekel <S%H1235><s%> weight, <S%H4948><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels weight <S%H4948><s%> of gold; <S%H2091><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> art thou? <S%H859><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray thee: <S%H4994><s%> is there <S%H3426><s%> room <S%H4725><s%> in thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> for us to lodge in? <S%H3885><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I <S%H595><s%> am the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> unto Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

She said <S%H559><s%> moreover unto <S%H413><s%> him, We have both <S%H1571><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> provender <S%H4554><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> room <S%H4725><s%> to lodge in. <S%H3885><s%>
And the man <S%H376><s%> bowed down his head, <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who <S%H834><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> left destitute <S%H5800><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> of his mercy <S%H2617><s%> and his truth: <S%H571><s%> I <S%H595><s%> being in the way, <S%H1870><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> led <S%H5148><s%> me to the house <S%H1004><s%> of my master's <S%H113><s%> brethren. <S%H251><s%>
And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> ran, <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> them of her mother's <S%H517><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> had a brother, <S%H251><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Laban: <S%H3837><s%> and Laban <S%H3837><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the well. <S%H5869><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earring <S%H5141><s%> and bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his sister's <S%H269><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and when he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me; that he came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man; <S%H376><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the well. <S%H5869><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Come in, <S%H935><s%> thou blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> standest <S%H5975><s%> thou without? <S%H2351><s%> for I <S%H595><s%> have prepared <S%H6437><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> and room <S%H4725><s%> for the camels. <S%H1581><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house: <S%H1004><s%> and he ungirded <S%H6605><s%> his camels, <S%H1581><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> for the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and the men's <S%H376><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him.

And there was set <S%H7760><s%> meat before <S%H6440><s%> him to eat: <S%H398><s%> but he said, <S%H559><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> eat, <S%H398><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H518><s%> I have told <S%H1696><s%> mine errand. <S%H1697><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Speak on. <S%H1696><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am Abraham's <S%H85><s%> servant. <S%H5650><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and he is become great: <S%H1431><s%> and he hath given <S%H5414><s%> him flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> and menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and maidservants, <S%H8198><s%> and camels, <S%H1581><s%> and asses. <S%H2543><s%>

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> my master's <S%H113><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> when <S%H310><s%> she was old: <S%H2209><s%> and unto him hath he given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath.

And my master <S%H113><s%> made me swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> to my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> I <S%H595><s%> dwell: <S%H3427><s%>

But <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> thou shalt go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> my kindred, <S%H4940><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> unto my son. <S%H1121><s%>
And I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my master, <S%H113><s%> Peradventure <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, The LORD, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I walk, <S%H1980><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, and prosper <S%H6743><s%> thy way; <S%H1870><s%> and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of my kindred, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> and of my father's house: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H423><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> thou comest <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my kindred; <S%H4940><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> they give <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thee one, thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> clear <S%H5355><s%> from my oath. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H423><s%>

And I came <S%H935><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the well, <S%H5869><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> if <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> thou do <S%H3426><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> I <S%H595><s%> go: <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> stand <S%H5324><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the well <S%H5869><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> and it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when the virgin <S%H5959><s%> cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, and I say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> her, Give me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of thy pitcher <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3537><s%> to drink; <S%H8248><s%>

And she say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me, Both <S%H1571><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and I will also <S%H1571><s%> draw <S%H7579><s%> for thy camels: <S%H1581><s%> let the same <S%H1931><s%> be the woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath appointed out <S%H3198><s%> for my master's <S%H113><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
